entries.text: UPS provides an official support home page that routes customers to tracking, claims, and billing support paths.
UPS offers a separate official tracking page for package status and delivery updates.
UPS uses a separate claims support flow for filing and managing shipment claims.
Billing and shipping charge issues are routed through support pages and account paths rather than a unified customer-resolution experience.
Public parcel-sector studies continue to show strong demand for better contact handling, status transparency, and issue resolution experiences.

current_strengths: Strong official tracking and claims surfaces
Official support home for multiple issue types
Mature self-service pathways for common tasks
current_gaps_observed_or_likely: Customers still navigate separate tracking, claims, billing, and support experiences
No public evidence of a unified support thread across channels
No public customer-visible issue tracker spanning support and claims interactions
No public conversational resolution orchestration layer for shipment issues
